experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: • Learnt about the PAGE model to estimate the social cost of Carbon and contributed to its upgradation to country-level estimates from larger region estimates• Employed the use of GIS software QGIS to extract the Land and Marine Areas of countries around the world as well as collected the population and GDP data• Extracted the ERA5 Temperature data of the past 40 years via the Google Earth Engine platform
experience.description_html: • Learnt about the PAGE model to estimate the social cost of Carbon and contributed to its upgradation to country-level estimates from larger region estimates• Employed the use of GIS software QGIS to extract the Land and Marine Areas of countries around the world as well as collected the population and GDP data• Extracted the ERA5 Temperature data of the past 40 years via the Google Earth Engine platform <!---->

experience.title: Global Emerging Leader Intern
experience.description: • Formulated Spares and Tool Management SOP, covering spare lifecycle and led collaborative effort with 30+ OEMs for detailed BOM and inventory selection• Analyzed spare parts via VED (Vital, Essential, Desirable) Analysis and identified their reorder level, reorder quantity and safety stock, enhancing the overall inventory control• Identified spares to be procured to maintain the minimum stock level by doing Stock Analysis and auditing the existing inventory• Discovered equipment to be retired via Equipment Health Assessment
experience.description_html: • Formulated Spares and Tool Management SOP, covering spare lifecycle and led collaborative effort with 30+ OEMs for detailed BOM and inventory selection• Analyzed spare parts via VED (Vital, Essential, Desirable) Analysis and identified their reorder level, reorder quantity and safety stock, enhancing the overall inventory control• Identified spares to be procured to maintain the minimum stock level by doing Stock Analysis and auditing the existing inventory• Discovered equipment to be retired via Equipment Health Assessment
